Articles.Content:
I'm trying to get my new part to surface attach to another part but it's upside-down, backwards, and rotated the wrong way.

how do I configure surface attachment?

EDIT: solved, I found out what **node\_attach** was for.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-09T09:05:37Z" title="05/09/2015 09:05  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 9, 2015</time> by Xyphos**
